WJBISQ-1.name: ALEX RIVERS

experience.title: Winner, SUSTHack Hackathon
experience.description: A cross-institutional event by Sunway University & Singapore Polytechnic

experience.title: Winner, EY Business Case Competition
experience.description: Led a winning team in solving real-world business challenges

experience.title: Community Service
experience.description: Active in community service projects including food banks and national religious organizations

experience.title: Committee Member, Sunway Photography Club
experience.description: Organized campus-wide photo walks and exhibitions

experience.title: Resume Parsing App
experience.description: Uses Generative AI to enhance ATS efficiency and streamline hiring pipelines (Personal Project)

experience.title: Home Lab with Honeypot
experience.description: Built to analyze attacker behavior and implement intrusion detection (Personal Project)

experience.title: Inventory Management System
experience.description: Designed and deployed for small retail operations using web technologies (Personal Project)

WJBISQ-1.quick summary: Alex Rivers is a cybersecurity enthusiast with a strong academic background (3.92 CGPA) and proven experience in hackathons and business competitions.  He possesses a range of technical skills including programming languages (Python, Java), networking tools (Cisco Packet Tracer), and cybersecurity platforms (TryHackMe).  His personal projects demonstrate initiative and practical application of skills.
WJBISQ-1.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Professional position at [Company Name]. We were impressed by your academic achievements, technical skills, and demonstrated passion for cybersecurity. Your personal projects, particularly the resume parsing app and honeypot setup, showcase your initiative and practical skills.  While your experience is primarily academic and project-based, we believe your potential is significant. We would like to invite you for an interview to discuss your qualifications further.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]

WJBISQ-2.name: Ng Shannon

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (Computer Networking and Security)

experience.title: IT Intern
experience.description: Helped set up company website, provided input on layout and content, basic troubleshooting, designed and built custom chatbot workflows in Respond.io, handled troubleshooting and communication with Respond.io support.

experience.title: Sales Assistant
experience.description: Gained product knowledge in electronic gadgets, practiced customer service, built strong teamwork.

experience.title: Teacher Assistant
experience.description: Developed problem-solving and communication skills, assisted with student supervision.

WJBISQ-2.quick summary: A year 2 student pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (Computer Networking and Security) with a 3.58 GPA.  Has experience in IT operations, digital automation (building chatbots), website development (HTML, CSS), and customer service.  Seeks a web or front-end role to gain more experience.
WJBISQ-2.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Ng Shannon,

Thank you for your interest in the cybersecurity professional position at [Company Name]. We appreciate you taking the time to submit your application.

While your academic record and some of your experiences are impressive, your current skill set and experience don't fully align with the requirements of this specific role.  We are looking for candidates with more direct experience in cybersecurity.  We wish you the best in your job search and encourage you to reapply when your experience more closely matches our requirements.

Sincerely,
The [Company Name] Hiring Team
